tool_description: Newscuration and Market sentiment on the Blockchain market
name: Daneel
title: Daneel

api_list.name: news

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated string of iso3166 countries(eg HT,FR,US). Default all

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: The order to sort the news in. Possible option: date, score (score calculated thanks to our machine learning models).

optional_parameters.name: currencies
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated string of symbol currencies

optional_parameters.name: data_start
optional_parameters.description: Date in timestamp for the oldest news

optional_parameters.name: data_end
optional_parameters.description: Date in timestamp for the newest news

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: keyword or phrase to search for.

api_list.name: Market information

required_parameters.name: currencies
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated string of symbol currencies
required_parameters.default: A comma-separated string of symbol currencies

optional_parameters.name: Format
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the returned format (array or object)
